Class StreamSocket

java.lang.Object

          nano.remexp.net.StreamSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class StreamSocket
extends NanoSocket

This class handles the stream sockets that receive stream data from the remote experiment.

Version:
1.1 23.08.2012
Author:
Dominic Bosch
